title: Experiential AI-STEAM Education Program: App Development and Image Recognition Integration for Elementary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Programming Concepts, Core Knowledge of Science Curriculum, and General Familiarity with Electromechanical Devices
context.additional_context: A course for practicing elementary teachers to experientially learn how to integrate AI technology into STEAM education. Participants use personal devices to directly manipulate the MIT App Inventor platform and PIC tools to develop educational content.

learning_goals: Participants can design an educational app with image classification functionality using MIT App Inventor.
Participants improve their ability to design STEAM projects that integrate electromechanical systems and image recognition technology.
Participants improve their self-efficacy by over 20% when designing AI-STEAM lessons based on experiential learning theory.
Participants can diagnose their instructional design capabilities and develop improvement plans based on formative assessment results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
